description: butcher +â€Ž bird, from its habit of hanging its prey.

entries.meaning: Any of the magpie-like birds in the genus Cracticus, family Artamidae, of Australia and New Guinea.
examples: A short way off, two male butcher birds, black and white like magpies, were calling antiphonally across a ravine.

entries.meaning: (US) Any of the shrikes in the genus Lanius.
(South Africa) The fiscal shrike, Lanius collaris.
